alert.note: Alert for Cavalier (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Cavalier County through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alsen, or 14 miles southwest of Langdon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nekoma, Alsen, Loma and Langdon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
